    • Method Detail

      • main

        public void main(int i)

      • die

        protected void die(int i)
        Adds money with a popup. Plays death sound. If overkill, fling bits everywhere, else create a corpse. Clear buffs. Remove from array.
        Parameters:
        i - id for buff stuff

        public void displayShadow()

      • displayMain

        public void displayMain()
        Display main sprite

      • damageWithBuff

        public void damageWithBuff(int damage,
                           java.lang.String buffName,
                           float effectLevel,
                           float effectDuration,
                           Turret turret,
                           boolean displayParticles,
                           java.lang.String damageType,
                           processing.core.PVector direction,
                           int id)
        Applies damage to the enemy, can also apply a buff
        Parameters:
        damage - the amount of damage to be taken
        buffName - the name of the buff to be applied, nullable
        effectLevel - level of the buff to be applied
        effectDuration - duration of the buff to be applied
        turret - turret that caused the damage, nullable
        displayParticles - if should create particles
        damageType - determines what effect to apply to corpse
        direction - determines where parts will be flung, (0, 0) for everywhere
        id - id of this enemy, set to -1 if unknown

      • damageWithoutBuff

        public void damageWithoutBuff(int damage,
                              Turret turret,
                              java.lang.String damageType,
                              processing.core.PVector direction,
                              boolean displayParticles)
        Applies damage to the enemy
        Parameters:
        damage - amount of damage to be applied
        turret - the turret that caused the damage, nullable
        damageType - determines what effect to apply to corpse
        direction - where parts will be flung, (0, 0) for everywhere
        displayParticles - whether it should spawn particles

      • damageEffect

        protected void damageEffect(boolean particles)
        Display hp bar. Tint.
        Parameters:
        particles - whether or not to display hurt particles

      • attack

        protected void attack()
        Angles towards target. Damages target turret or machine. Messes with state a bit. Prevents attacking multiple times at once.
